name: A Fishy Game
description:
A Fishy Game is a fun little free clicker game.

In this game you need to click a fish to gather it. After you've gathered some fish you can buy stuff with it to collect more fish. You can also do achievements. There is no real ending to this game.

Have fun!

Lastest update: Version 2.00 (24/04/2017)

Changelog:

-Complete remake of the game.

-New graphics

-More Achievements
